nodes.text: Cedo Partu was a pioneer on Tatooine.

In its early days, Partu served as the town leader of Mos Eisley.
He built a blockhouse that served as a fortification against Tusken Raiders, which later became Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina. Following his death, the Prophetess would claim that Wuher was the reincarnated soul of Cedo Partu.

The name "Cedo Partu" first appeared in the Mos Eisley Adventure Set, to identify the bartender in Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina. The name never stuck however, and the bartender was later identified as "Wuher".
Pablo Hidalgo created a retcon in Star Wars Insider 91 to acknowledge the old name—making Cedo Partu a new character, and the Prophetess' claim that Wuher was the reincarnated soul of Cedo Partu.
